sect2.title: Vim Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: as, ld, strip Coreutils: cat, chmod, cp, echo, expr, ln, mkdir, mv, rm, touch, tr, uname, wc, whoami Diffutils: cmp, diff Find: find GCC: cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Make: make Net-tools: hostname Sed: sed
